availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Owsley County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Sarah J. Noland Lane on December 15, 1858. Farmer in Owsley County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #994027-994058, Owsley County Marriages, p. unknown. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owsley County, Proctor, p. 390. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Powell County, Stanton, Precinct 4, p. 5. Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #994027-994058, Powell County Deaths, file #29816.
